title: Perfect Onion Soup
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons olive oil', '4 medium onions, sliced 5mm thick', '15g unsalted butter', '1 clove garlic, thinly sliced', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 bay leaf', 'salt to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground white pepper', '175ml dry white wine', '2 litres chicken stock', '125ml port wine', '6 slices French bread', '265g Gruyere cheese, grated']
